name: Nutzoids
description: Through the mysterious workings of the universe one day brown things were suddenly appearing in space - a lot of them. No one knew what they were, but someone came up with the name "Nutzoids", and it stuck. And whenever strange object appear in space the right answer can only be... to kill'em all. That's where you come into the picture. So just go out there, and do what you're best at. Pump that SHIFT key and steer that mighty vessel through the vast voids with the LEFT and RIGHT ARROW BUTTONS. You can go home when you get to score 100. Good luck, and may the gods be with you!
